title: Defense Secretary Mattis Arrives Qatar
description:
(28 Sep 2017) US Secretary of Defense James Mattis has paid an unannounced visit to Doha, Qatar.
He met with the nation's Emir and defence minister.
The meetings were held at the Al Udeid Air Base.
The visit comes after President Donald Trump said earlier this month he was willing to act as a mediator to resolve the months-long dispute between Qatar and its gulf neighbours.
Mattis has been visiting countries in region including meetings with the leadership of Afghanistan.
